description.zh: flatnotes 是一个自托管、无需数据库的笔记记录网页应用，使用扁平文件夹中的 Markdown 文件存储笔记。它提供简洁无干扰的用户界面，支持强大的搜索和标签功能。用户可通过响应式移动端网页访问笔记，并可自定义身份验证设置。
description.en: flatnotes is a self-hosted, database-less note-taking web application that stores notes as markdown files in a flat folder structure. It provides a clean, distraction-free interface for managing notes, with powerful search and tagging capabilities. Users can access their notes via a mobile-responsive web interface and customize authentication settings.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 笔记以纯 Markdown 文件形式存储，确保数据开放性和可迁移性
- 无需数据库或复杂文件夹结构
- 轻量级设计，界面简洁，专注于内容本身
- 支持增量搜索索引缓存，提升性能

## 功能列表:

- 响应式移动网页界面
- 支持原始 Markdown 编辑与所见即所得编辑模式
- 高级搜索功能，支持快捷键调用
- 笔记标签功能
- 可自定义主页
- 支持 Wikilink 链接格式，便于笔记间跳转
- 支持浅色/深色主题切换
- 多种身份验证选项（无验证、只读访问、用户名/密码、双因素认证）
- 提供 RESTful API 接口
- 支持通过 Docker 自托管部署
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- Notes are stored as plain markdown files, ensuring openness and portability.
- No database or complex folder structure required.
- Lightweight and distraction-free design focused on content.
- Supports incremental search index caching for performance.

## Features:

- Mobile responsive web interface
- Raw/WYSIWYG markdown editor modes
- Advanced search functionality with keyboard shortcut support
- Note tagging functionality
- Customizable home page
- Wikilink support for easy note linking
- Light/dark themes
- Multiple authentication options (none, read-only, username/password, 2FA)
- RESTful API
- Self-hosting support via Docker
